ravensproject

Class RavensFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • ravensproject.RavensFigure

  • public class RavensFigure
extends java.lang.Object
    A single figure in a Raven's Progressive Matrix problem, comprised of a name and a HashMap of RavensObjects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RavensFigure(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String problemName, java.lang.String setName)
      Creates a new figure for a Raven's Progressive Matrix given a name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the figure.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,RavensObject> getObjects()
      Returns a HashMap of RavensObjects from the figure.
      java.lang.String getVisual()
      Returns the filename of the visual representation of this figure in the problem.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RavensFigure

        public RavensFigure(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String problemName,
            java.lang.String setName)
        Creates a new figure for a Raven's Progressive Matrix given a name. Your agent does not need to use this method.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the figure

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the figure. The name of the figure will always match the HashMap key for this figure. The figures in the problem will be named A, B, and C for 2x2 problems. The figures in the problem will be named A, B, C, D, E, F, G, and H in 3x3 problems. The first row is A, B, and C; the second row is D, E, and F; and the third row is G and H. Answer options will always be named "1" through "6" for 2x2 problems and "1" through "8" for 3x3 problems.
        Returns:
        the name of this figure

      • getObjects

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,RavensObject> getObjects()
        Returns a HashMap of RavensObjects from the figure. This is the verbal representation of the problem. If no verbal representation is available (if hasVerbal() returns false), then this HashMap will be empty.
        Returns:
        a HashMap of RavensObject, indexed by object names.

      • getVisual

        public java.lang.String getVisual()
        Returns the filename of the visual representation of this figure in the problem. The files will always be .PNG files.
        Returns:
        the filename of the visual representation of this figure.
